product_name: The North Face Expedition Crew Neck Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: Make even the coldest trips more comfortable in the heavyweight Expedition Crew Neck long underwear top from The North Face. It uses FlashDry? fabric for quick-drying, next-to-skin comfort. Heavyweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut husks and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams, which are designed to enhance motion. The North Face Expedition Crew Neck long underwear top offers a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: Make even the coldest trips more comfortable in the heavyweight Expedition Crew Neck long underwear top from The North Face. It uses FlashDry? fabric for quick-drying, next-to-skin comfort.
